title: Introduction to C Programming Language
preamble: To be a Computer Scientist, you must be able to talk with Computers— talk with Computers in a way Computers understand. In Computer Science Parlance, we call it 'Programming'.
In this course, we will guide you through C — from Beginner Zero Level to Intermediate.
At the end of this course, you will feel comfortable to instruct Computers in C Programming Language, and thus begin your journey to be a Computer Scientist.

title: Introduction to Data Structures
preamble: Working with Computers involves storing and processing Data.
Storing data in a structured way facilitates further processing and manipulation.
In this course, you will learn Abstract Data Structures in Computer Science and implement them in C language.

title: Introduction to Algorithm Analysis
preamble: Even when there were no computers, there were algorithms.
Now there are computers, and there are more algorithms.
Study of algorithms is fundamental to CS. Apart from Computers, Algorithm itself is another technology worth investigating on its own.
In this course, we will walk you through some Classic Algorithms, Analysis of Time and Space Complexity of Algorithms, different Algorithms Paradigms, and Algorithm Modifying and Devising Technique.

title: Theory of Computation
preamble: They say, 'Dream becomes Reality'.
Reality is to Modern Computers as Dream is to 'Theory of Computation'.
With no study of Theory of Computation, you cannot be a Theoretical Computer Scientist. There are many practical situations where knowledge of Theory of Computation is vital.
In this course, we will see the gradual development of Theoretical Foundations of present day Computing Machines.

title: Machine Learning
preamble: It all started with questions like — Can computers be intelligent like us humans?

Then, a big part of our intelligence is: we, humans, can learn from examples and experiences. Then another question — can we give a machine the ability to learn like us? Here begins the story of Machine Learning.
This course will start by giving you an overview of Machine Learning, then will gradually prepare you for practical projects with Machine Learning.

title: Python from Zero to Hero
preamble: In today's Computing World, Python is a big big anaconda!
It has applications in diverse field including Data Science, Machine Learning, Statistics and various branches of Artificial Intelligence.
This course will start Python from ground level and take you to advanced expertise in Python.
